title: Patient Login with MFA
text: The system shall allow a patient user to authenticate using email and password, and require second-factor verification (OTP via email) if login occurs from a new device. Lock account after 5 failed attempts within 10 minutes. Audit all authentication events.

title: Allergy Update Validation
text: Clinicians shall be able to update a patient's allergy record. The system must validate that contraindicated medications are flagged and warns the clinician prior to saving. All changes must be versioned and attributed to the modifying user.

title: Password Reset via Email
text: The system shall allow a user to reset their password by submitting a registered email address. A secure reset link shall be sent via email, valid for 15 minutes. The new password must meet complexity requirements and all reset events must be logged.

title: Inventory Role Access
text: The system shall allow only users with the Admin role to view, edit, or delete inventory records. Non-admin users may view but cannot modify inventory data. Unauthorized access attempts must be logged.

title: Inventory Stock Alerts
text: The system shall automatically generate low-stock alerts when an itemâ€™s quantity drops below a configured threshold. Alerts must be sent to Admin and Inventory Manager roles via dashboard and email.

title: Expired Items Handling
text: Expired medical items shall be flagged automatically and excluded from availability lists. The system must allow authorized users to dispose of expired items after logging the action.
